name: 健康傳播理論與實務
description: 本課程之目標乃使同學認識健康傳播在新世紀所產生的議題及所面對的困難與契機，期望同學可以透過閱讀相關文獻，瞭解健康傳播的理論及製播訊息的過程，並能將理論運用在實務上，甚而能對相關議題或介入方案進行批判和提出改進之道。
goals: 瞭解健康傳播相關議題及理論
將所學之理論運用在實務上
對健康傳播的現行狀況提出省思
syllabus:
週次

課程內容

第01週（2/21）

課程進度介紹

第02週（2/28）

228放假一天

第03週（3/07）

Current challenge of health communication

Ch 1 in Ref 1: The challenge of health care and disability

Ch 1 in Ref 2: Overview of communication and health

\[Act and share\] Share new heath communication issues in Taiwan

第04週（3/14）

Related factors of health communication

Ch 1 in Ref 1: Emerging demographics and health care trends

Ch 1 in Ref 3: Analysis of the situation

\[Act and share\] Pick one issue you want to dig about

第05週（3/21）

Disparities in races and cultures

Ch 3 in Ref 1: Communication strategies for reducing racial and cultural disparities

Ch 5 in Ref 2: Culture and diversity issues in healthcare

\[Act and share\] Identify the audience of the issue you picked

第06週（3/28）

New media and future

Ch 4 in Ref 1: Health communication: Trends and future directions

Ch 5 in Ref 1: Emerging trends in the new media landscape

\[Act and share\] Review the related information about the issue

第07週（4/04）

放假一天

第08週（4/11）

Communication and health care

Ch 6 in Ref 2: Communication and healthcare organization

Ch 6 in Ref 1: Enhancing consumer involvement in health care

\[Act and share\] Find some pitfalls of previous information

第09週（4/18）

期中書面報告

選一個有興趣的健康議題，探討此議題目前現有的健康傳播內容及方式，包括其所涉及的目標對象及所對應的傳播內容，並據以提出目前的健康傳播策略有何優缺點。

第10週（4/25）

Provide-patient communication

Ch 2 in Ref 2: Provider-patient communication

Ch 10 in Ref 1: Improving physician-patient communication

\[Act and share\] Share some issues or news about physician-patient communication

第11週（5/02）

E-health

Ch 7 in Ref 1: E-health self-care interventions for persons with chronic disease

Ch 9 in Ref 1: Engaging consumers in health care advocacy using the internet

\[Act and share\] Share some issues or news about electronic communications

第12週（5/09）

Social support

Ch 3 in Ref 2: Social support and health

Ch 8 in Ref 1: Increasing computer-mediated social support

\[Act and share\] Share some issues or news about the effects of social support on the any health issue

第13週（5/16）

Risk communication

Ch 9 in Ref 2: Risk and crisis communication

Ref 4: Design features of graphs in health risk communication: A systematic review

\[Act and share\] Present some graphs or photos under your recommendation

第14週（5/23）

Communication Message

Ch 12 in Ref 1: Making the grade: identification of evidence-based communication messages

Ch 5 in Ref 3: The message brief

\[Act and share\] Present some messages that impress you

第15週（5/30）

Health campaigns

Ch 10 in Ref 2: Health campaigns and community health initiatives

Ch 4 in Ref 3: Strategic approach

\[Act and share\] Name a campaign which impresses you

第16週（6/06）

Knowledge translation and knowledge value mapping

Ch 13 in Ref 1: New strategies of knowledge translation: A knowledge value mapping framework

Ref 5: Engaging national organizations for knowledge translation: comparative case studies in knowledge value mapping.

\[Act and share\] Define knowledge translation in your own works and share an example

第17週（6/13）

Health literacy

Ch 11 in Ref 1: Health literacy in the digital world

Ch 16 in Ref 1: New media: A third force in health care

\[Act and share\] Share an article focusing on health literacy

第18週（6/20）

期末書面報告

根據期中報告的文獻整理，針對該議題在過去健康傳播策略上的缺點，運用知識轉譯的概念，設計出一個新的傳播訊息，並據此撰寫一小篇專欄文章。

methodologies.note: 教師就文獻內容進行講述
學生就上課內容進行討論分享
學生分組針對所選題目進報告
播放主題相關影片，同學提問討論。
運用即時討論軟件進行線上即時互動討論

grading.note: 書面報告：特定健康議題相關之健康傳播策略的文獻回顧
書面報告：專寫一篇健康議題之專欄文章
每堂課均需參與文章報告和課後討論分享
